live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.

Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50153.summary: Some customers in Burrows area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50153.title: May 31 - Winnipeg (Burrows) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
